  • Method Details

    • nextEra

      void nextEra()
      Changes world state by one era

    • startFollowAnimal

      Genes startFollowAnimal​(Vector2D position, long id)
      Set animal on given position with given id as followed
      Parameters:
      position - followed animals position
      id - followed animal id
      Returns:
      returns followed animals genes set

    • followedAnimalStats

      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> followedAnimalStats()
      Calculates followed animals stats and return them as list
      Returns:
      returns three-element list of followed animal where first element is: death era, second: children number, third: descendants number

    • allAnimalsWithDominantGenes

      java.util.List<Animal> allAnimalsWithDominantGenes()
      Selects all animals which have the same genes set as dominant
      Returns:
      returns list of animals having dominant genes set

    • setGlobalStatsParams

      void setGlobalStatsParams​(int startEra, int stopEra)
      Set params to generate global stats
      Parameters:
      startEra - the era when data collecting for global stats starts
      stopEra - the era when data collecting for global stats stops

    • getProperties

      MapProperties getProperties()
      Returns:
      returns map properties object

    • getAnimalsList

      java.util.TreeMap<Vector2D,​java.util.ArrayList<Animal>> getAnimalsList()
      Returns:
      returns map of animals, where positions are keys and list of animals on given positions are values

    • getAnimalsNumber

      int getAnimalsNumber()
      Returns:
      returns current alive animals number

    • getPlantsList

      java.util.TreeMap<Vector2D,​Plant> getPlantsList()
      Returns:
      returns map of plants where positions are keys and plants are values

    • getEra

      int getEra()
      Returns:
      returns current era on the map

    • getDominantGenes

      Genes getDominantGenes()
      Returns:
      returns dominant genes

    • getAliveAnimalsEnergyAverage

      long getAliveAnimalsEnergyAverage()
      Returns:
      returns alive animals energy average

    • getDeadAnimalsLifeTimeAverage

      long getDeadAnimalsLifeTimeAverage()
      Returns:
      returns dead animals life time average

    • getChildrenNumberAverage

      double getChildrenNumberAverage()
      Returns:
      returns alive animals children number average
